title: Greenhouse effect warms Earth from -15°C to 15°C

content.prompt: If Earth had no atmosphere, the mean surface temperature would be approximately -15°C. With our present atmosphere, Earth’s mean surface temperature is approximately +15°C. Which of the following is the best explanation for this difference?

choices.label: Reflection of incident solar radiation by clouds
Absorption of ultraviolet radiation by the ozone layer
Absorption of infrared radiation by atmospheric gases
The breakdown of oxygen molecules in the thermosphere

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
